# WP Media (Wirtualna Polska)

## Examples

```html
<amp-ad
  height="320"
  type="wpmedia"
  data-bunch="7757"
  data-sn="sg"
  data-slot="3"
  data-slots="3,10"
>
</amp-ad>
```

```html
<amp-ad
  height="250"
  type="wpmedia"
  data-bunch="7757"
  data-sn="sg"
  data-slot="10"
  data-slots="3,10"
>
</amp-ad>
```

### Required parameter

-   `data-slot`
-   `data-bunch`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-slots`
-   `data-sn`

## Configuration

For configuration details please contact cbfd@grupawp.pl
